title: Ping Spikes in game
body: Ever since last patch I will be at 67 ping or so and then suddenly shoot up to 600 making it impossible to play. Is there any way to fix this issue?

replies.body:
Because patches only modify local files inside of your League directory, they're **very unlikely** to cause any changes in your connection. Because there are a ton of potential causes that could change your latency to the server, I recommend starting with our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if you continue to see latency spikes after taking those steps.
